title: Board of Complementary Health Care Providers - Applications & Forms
cleaned_text: Requests (PDF)](/pfr/professionallicensing/sites/maine.gov.pfr.professionallicensing/files/inline-files/policy_license_verifications_0.pdf) Effective March 1, 2019, the Office of Professional and Occupational Regulation (OPOR) will no longer issue paper license verifications. License verifications are available, free of charge, on OPOR's official database, [https://www.pfr.maine.gov/ALMSOnline/ALMSQuery/Welcome.aspx?board=4450.](https://www.pfr.maine.gov/ALMSOnline/ALMSQuery/Welcome.aspx?board=4450) This database is updated in real time as changes occur. The Office of Professional and Occupational Regulation considers this information to be a secure, primary source for license verification. Many of our services are now available online [Apply for a License Online](https://licensing.web.maine.gov/cgi-bin/online/licensing/begin.pl?board_number=4450) [Renew a License](https://licensing.web.maine.gov/cgi-bin/online/licensing/begin.pl?board_number=4450) [Check the Status of an Application and Submit Additional Documentation Online](https://licensing.web.maine.gov/cgi-bin/online/licensing/begin.pl?board_number=4450) [Update Contact Information](https://licensing.web.maine.gov/cgi-bin/online/licensing/begin.pl?board_number=4450) [Request a Duplicate [Verify a License](https://www.pfr.maine.gov/almsonline/almsquery/welcome.aspx?board=4450) [Obtain a License Verification](https://www.pfr.maine.gov/almsonline/almsquery/welcome.aspx?board=4450)Effective March 1, 2019 the Office no longer issues paper license verifications. License verifications are available, free of charge online.
